a.n: Des Racines & Des Ailes - Passion Patrimoine

p.d: A journey through Limousin, from the Creuse to the Correze and the Haute-Vienne, with its innumerable listed buildings and beauty spots. Our voyage begins in Beaulieu-sur-Dordogne, on the banks of the Dordogne, home to a gem of Romanesque architecture: a 12th century church, that's been undergoing restoration for twenty years. Directed by: Fran√ßois Cardon (France, 2018)
